page.title: 14CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: There exists in the village some 56 clubs and societies.In addition to the church activities listed previously, the following also are found. COMMUNITY ASSOC CLUBS - Social, Indoor Bowls, Diamond, Wine & beermaking, Theatre, Keep Fit, Toddlers, Sailing, Judo, Tennis, Bingo, Ladies' and Dancing Classes. SPORTS CLUBS - Rugby, Football, Cricket, Squash, and Badminton. HOSPITAL CLUBS - Outdoor Bowls, Social, Entertainments, and League of Friends. OTHER CLUBS - Drama, History, Angling, Horticulture,Rambling, Conservation, British Legion, Tenants, Residents, Young Farmers, Yoga, Over 60's, Baby Sitters, Play Group, National Housewives, Horseriders, Parent's Assoc.,Evening Inst., Art, W.E.A.,Girl Guides, Boy Scouts and Cubs.
